name: Specton Audio Analyser
tagline: Cross platform (Windows/Linux/Mac OS X) audio file analysis tool
body:
### What is this
A tool to identify and analyse various audio formats. View bitrate and encoder info, spectrogram and bitrate graphs etc

Currently in Alpha release (that means it might not work)

Supports: MP3, AAC, Vorbis, FLAC, Opus, Musepack, Wav and more

### How to get it
Windows: Use the binary installers

### Screenshots
Coming soon

### License
GNU GPL 2.0

### Author
@somesortoferror

### Support or Contact
[Issues](https://github.com/somesortoferror/specton/issues)
